name: xsltproc
description: 应用 XSLT 样式表将 XML 文档转换为其他格式（如 HTML、文本等）

Show logs of what is happening

Dump the tree of the result instead of actual content
Dump the registered extension elements and functions to stdout

Do not dump the transformation result
Increase the maximum depth (default 3000)
Increase the maximum variables (default 15000)

Initialize pseudo random number generator with specific seed
Treat input document(s) as HTML file(s)
Specify the input document character encoding

Pass a (parameter, UTF8 string value) pair without XPath syntax
Provide a set of paths for resources (DTDs, stylesheets, etc.)

Refuse to write to any file or resource

Allow file write only within the specified path subtree
